column4: Is there any way to make 1080p videos work correctly on a Pentium M 1400 MHZ 1GB ram?
your only hope would be if it has a good vudeo card
hydh, I dont think so, It Is an integrated intel stuff
I dont think so, It Is an integrated intel stuff
probably no luck then :(
xD
laptop or desktop?
laptop
yeah, not gonna happen Enissay - to do 1080p on that kinda proc, you need video card acceleration
what about 720p vids?
maybe, but i also douby it
*doubt
yeah... thanks mate :)
glad to help, Enissay
fwiw, you want mplayer's vdpau option when you're dealing with low power but accelerated video
didnt get it?
if you're doing video on a machne with a crappy processor but a good video card, you can use mplayer's vdpau option to run the video decodinf on the video card :)
ow, I see... but it's not my case... coz the whole laptop is crap lol
yeah, sorry it doesn't help with that :(
ow, u certainly did with these informations :)
for reference, i use a very low-powered Atom machine for my TV PC, and it decodes 1080P perfectly with mplayer :)
cool :)
